Old memories arise... Started with an ZX-81 with less then 1KB memory and no keyboard! Only some pressure sensitive plate. then came sinclair Spectrum, VC20, VC64, ATARI 512STM, AMIGA 500 and then, where we are landed in the end, a PC.

I see the games and it makes me feel warm. Bubble Bobble on C64 ruled at that time big, hooo!!
